description.displayText:
Meela cared for our daughter for over 6 months. From the moment we interviewed her to when she entered our home we could tell she had a keen understanding of child development and truly cares about the children and families she works with. 
She taught our daughter how to communicate via baby sign language, she came up with exciting activities like finger painting, dancing, and music time, and took her outside for a walk twice a day. She knows how to sleep train, develop a consistent routine, and fit herself in a household where everyone is home.

She went above and beyond her responsibilities often tidying up our home, organizing our daughter's clothing, helping us pack for weekend getaways, and coming up with new foods for her to eat. Meela is insightful, caring, dedicated, and does everything she can to help your child grow, develop, and flourish. She is constantly learning and challenging herself and came up with ways to address the challenges we were having, like sleep training.

description.displayText: Jameela was really wonderful with our two kids, and has a wealth of knowledge and expertise that she brought to her time with them. She has really calm and warm energy and is really flexible to what we needed. I definitely recommend her
description.originalText: Jameela was really wonderful with our two kids, and has a wealth of knowledge and expertise that she brought to her time with them. She has really calm and warm energy and is really flexible to what we needed. I definitely recommend her

description.displayText: Jameela was fabulous with both our toddler and our infant - they both warmed to her right away.  We felt confident that they were in good hands with her and we sensed immediately that she was very respectful of our decision making as parents.  We think very highly of her!
description.originalText: Jameela was fabulous with both our toddler and our infant - they both warmed to her right away.  We felt confident that they were in good hands with her and we sensed immediately that she was very respectful of our decision making as parents.  We think very highly of her!

description.displayText: She's listens to every detail and forgets nothing. She is an Education major so her tutoring skills are top-tier! She is so attentive even has stayed late a couple times with no complaints. She is an excellent caretaker and is very thorough. Her skills are unmatched!!
